-- User agent preference strings Custom user agent This setting will take effect when the browser is restarted. Invalid user agents are ignored. Set default user agent
-- Private Mode Preference strings Private Browsing This will reset your browsing instance and permanently delete all browsing data at the end of each browsing session. The theme changes to grey to indicate that this setting is enabled.
